name: Summertime Saga
storyline:
Your father recently passed away due to a suspicious accident at age 40 leaving you orphaned. The police investigated the nature behind your father's death but no conclusive results were found.

You've been taken in my an old friend of your father's who is now being pressured by some crooks over debt your father allegedly owes.

Today is your first day back at college after taking some time off to deal with your father's death and you have resolved to make enough money for your next semester's tuition, find out what happened to your father, and find a date for the Sorority Ball.

You'll then wake up and get ready for your first day back where control is granted to you to start exploring the world.
summary:
Summertime Saga is an adult orientated high quality dating sim game, currently in development and funded wholly by Patreon backers.

Set in a small suburban town, a young man just entering college is struck by the death of his father. Mysterious circumstances surrounding the death are only the beginning of his problems as he learns that his father was in debt to a group of shady criminals.

The game features over 65 characters to meet and interact with, over 30 unique locations, 20+ mini games, with hours of new content being added every update.
